Package index

All functions

assign_rarity_types()
Assign rarity types based on rarity restriction
avg_evol_dist()
Calculate average evolutionary distinctiveness (ED) for a set of species

Retrieve and Clean BIEN Trait Data for a Species

Build Trait Data from the LEDA Traitbase
calc_range_size()
Calculate range sizes for multiple species
calculate_phylo_mpd()
Calculate Phylogenetic Mean Pairwise Distance (MPD) per Species per Site
check_biomes()
Analyze Species Convex Hulls Against Biome Data
check_continents()
Check Range Intersections with Continent Polygons
clean_trait_data_BIEN()
Clean BIEN Trait Data
clip_polygons_to_land()
Clip species range polygons to land boundaries
collapse_BIEN_traits()
Collapse BIEN Trait Data by Species
compute_mean_si()
Compute Mean Scarcity Index (Si) for Each Species
compute_wcss()
Compute Within-Cluster Sum of Squares (WCSS)
eval_restriction_performance()
Evaluate Restriction Performance Using ANOVA
find_optimal_k()
Find the Optimal Number of Clusters (k) Using the Elbow Method
fun_dist()
Calculate Relative Functional Distinctiveness (FD) from Trait Data
gdrare_pipeline()
Global Discretized Rarity Pipeline
get_best_methods()
Get Best Methods of Applying Each Restriction Per Response Variable Based on AIC
get_continent_sf()
Get continent spatial data from a GeoJSON file
get_phy_angio()
Get Phylogeny of Angiosperms
get_range_convex_hulls()
Get Convex Hull Polygons for Species from GBIF Data
map_est_types()
Map Rarity Types to Established Restrictions.
prepare_gdrarity_axes()
Compute Rarity Dimensions Based on Selected Restrictions
prepare_gdrarity_models()
Prepare Restrictions for the Global Model of Discretized Rarity
range_sizes()
Compute range sizes (sq km) from clipped or raw range polygons
rename_model_code()
Rename Restriction Codes to Simplified Names
rename_model_columns()
Rename Columns in a Data Frame Based on Restriction Names
restriction_performance_pipeline()
Run Full Restriction Performance Pipeline
